body: So FightToWin had a little forum post on mczone which told us how to work out how many kills you needed to get a certain KD. Can anyone remember it? Don't worry if you cant. It was quite a while ago :)
body_tagged: So FightToWin had a little forum post on mczone which told us how to work out how many kills you needed to get a certain KD. Can anyone remember it? Don't worry if you cant. It was quite a while ago :)
title: Ok, Anyone Remember this?

replies.body: if you multiply the KD you want by your current deaths it gives you the amount of Kills you'd need I think
replies.body_tagged: if you multiply the KD you want by your current deaths it gives you the amount of Kills you'd need I think

replies.body: Nupe doesen't work xD Or I need 18936 kills to get a kd of 4....... With no deaths LOL
replies.body_tagged: Nupe doesen't work xD Or I need 18936 kills to get a kd of 4....... With no deaths LOL
